content.body: so for events in the web integration, the current idea (since we discussed it with various web platform folks in the Web Engines Hackfest) is to add a property to the event object containing the `AsyncContext.Snapshot` for the originating/causal event (possibly `null`)
content.formatted_body: so for events in the web integration, the current idea (since we discussed it with various web platform folks in the Web Engines Hackfest) is to add a property to the event object containing the AsyncContext.Snapshot for the originating/causal event (possibly null)

content.body: does anyone want to pitch in with ideas for the name of that property? `originatingContext`? `causalContext`? `causalContextSnapshot`?
content.formatted_body: does anyone want to pitch in with ideas for the name of that property? originatingContext? causalContext? causalContextSnapshot?

content.body: I'm not sure any of those are great, does anyone have ideas?
